column3: GitHub updates OSF logs when files are modified outside the OSF.
The OSF does not currently alter the permissions of linked GitHub repos.
GitHub authorization tokens will be copied to a forked project only if the user creating the fork has also authorized the project's GitHub add-on. The linked repo will not be forked on GitHub.

GitHub authorization tokens will be copied to a registered project, and the state of all existing branches will be stored upon registration. However, if the GitHub repo its deleted or its history is changed, the contents of the registration will also change.
